## StatelessEventBus.context() method

If called during event processing, returns current side effect accumulator / interceptor context. Otherwise returns nothing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
context(): InterceptorContext | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`InterceptorContext | undefined`
